SEARCH
Module com.snake

Package com.snake

package com.snake
A program based on snakee-v7-src that has been modified heavily and extended to include more levels, different sprites, a high score system, user settings and has been changed from Swing to JavaFX
Author:
Maxim Carr
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameModel
    Class stores data and is used to pass info (scores and settings) between scenes.
    GameOverController
    Controls the end game screen - Image used in view is the one from the original codebase - Picture is correct size - Displays score, allows user to save if they scored high enough - If the user has won the game, they can pick Endless Mode from this screen.
    HighScoreController
    Retrieves scores from file via GameModel and displays them to the user, If the file doesn't exist, this class makes it, again via GameModel.
    HintController
    Controls the display of hints and game information which are shown on first run or by clicking the relevant button on the main menu
    IntStorage
    Stores an integer - required for display loop to work as normal int is not final or semi-final
    LevelController
    Based on MyFrame and Play - Controls the display of levels as well as their component sprites (snake, fruit, walls) and JavaFX controls, handles user input to snake via KeyListeners.
    Main
    Separate Main class that does not extend Application
    Play
    Play contains the main setup method start()
    SettingsController
    Controls the screen while the user is in the settings view, provides controls to set game settings
    SpriteModel
    Stores sprite data and performs sprite logic - Based on GameUtil, ImageUtil, Snake, Food
    StartScreenController
    Controls the display of the main menu
